articles.title: Basketball Africa League unveils rosters ahead of inaugural season - NBA.com
articles.description: The rosters feature 154 players from 24 countries across Africa, Europe, the Middle East and the U.S.
articles.content:
NBA and G League veteran Ben Uzoh is one of the 154 players participating in the BAL.

articles.title: Volkswagen Golf GTI tuned to Clubsport-levels by Manhart Performance - Carmag South Africa
articles.description: The all-new eighth-generation Volkswagen Golf GTI is soon to arrive in SA without its hard-edged Clubsport 45 counterpart. Although this derivative is available in Europe, German-based tuner Manhart has put together a package for the standard GTI to match the…
